title: Virtual Prototyping Specialist – RF embedded systems (m/f/d)
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. Dynamic, amazing people and inspiring, innovative technologies are the norms here.
description: As a member of our Design Verification team in this highly transparent role, you are our specialist in crafting Virtual Prototype models and platforms for our RF-embedded systems. These virtual prototype platforms are targeted for pre-silicon Firmware and software development and system verification prior to silicon availability.
key_qualifications: We will be counting on your expertise and years of hands-on experience in object-oriented programming concepts. Very good expertise in C/C++ programming. Prior experience in SystemC programming, transaction-level modeling (TLM), and general simulator concepts is a plus. Work experience in the cellular modem and digital signal processing area is an advantage. Your communication skills are excellent and you are used to working in an environment with tight-knit collaboration with different teams like the rest of us here at Apple you love working in an open and multicultural environment. Proficient English language skills are required.
education_experience: Bachelor's or Master's degree in Electrical Engineering/ Electronics, Computer Science, or equivalent is required.
